entry.title: WIND WARNING, Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 p.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near the British Columbia border overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 then to 70 gusting to 100 this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of rain near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 mm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 7.
